name: Tivella
overview: Tivella provides solutions for the video on demand and interactive services over IP marketplaces. It offers VIPbox, a software for IP-based set-top boxes; and TAS servers for providing administrative services for the VIPbox based set-top boxes networks. The company also provides corporate messaging and training, business updates, private channels, and information/announcements solutions for enterprise TV; and video/audio advertisements, price promotion, and product launch solutions for retail TV. In addition, it offers video-on-demand, video distribution from district level, real-time broadcasts, and e-rate certified solutions for education TV. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Half Moon Bay, California. As of January 9, 2007, Tivella, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Cisco Systems, Inc.

acquisition.source_description: Cisco Announces Agreement to Acquire Tivella
